Name: Shield with the Head of Bes
Description: A very well decorated head of the god Bes is on the front of this aegis, or shield. Bes is depicted in his usual form with a big face, plump cheeks, and a very finely sculpted big beard. His tongue protrudes from his mouth. His facial features are noticeably African, especially the nose. His eyes were probably inlaid with another material. His prominent ears project from the front of his head like those of a monster.
